code: import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/CAJAL/Desktop/main/Sourcecode/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{FETCH_SETTINGS,FETCH_SETTINGS_SUCCESS,FETCH_SETTINGS_FAILED,EDIT_SETTINGS,CLEAR_SETTINGS_ERROR}from"../store/types";const INITIAL_STATE={settings:null,loading:false,error:{flag:false,msg:null}};export const settingsreducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:INITIAL_STATE;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case FETCH_SETTINGS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});case FETCH_SETTINGS_SUCCESS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{settings:action.payload,loading:false});case FETCH_SETTINGS_FAILED:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{settings:null,loading:false,error:{flag:true,msg:action.payload}});case EDIT_SETTINGS:return state;case CLEAR_SETTINGS_ERROR:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:{flag:false,msg:null}});default:return state;}};
